related_questions.question:
My House    I am Nisa. I live in Patokbeusi. My house is at no. 40 Jl. Raya Patokbeust. It's not big house
It's medium. It's painted grey. It has two floors. I like it anyway. It has a small garden and palm
and mango tree in front of the house. It has looks green and nice
My house has four bedrooms, two living rooms, a dining room, a kitchen and two
bathrooms. My bedroom is in the front part of the house, next to the living room. My parents' room
is in the middle part of the house next to the dining room. The kitchen and the bathroom are at the
back part of the house. I love house
very
much​

Penjelasan:

4. Jawabannya c. sits karena kalimat menggunakan bentuk Simple Present Tense.

5. Jawabannya c. travel agent karena di airport ramai, sesuai menurut teks.

6. Indonesia terletak di antara dua benua (continents), yaitu benua Asia dan Australia.

related_questions.question:
Quiz ;)    Most fish use their side, back, and tail fins for swimming. Fins (1) … movable, fanlike parts. A fish (2) … through the water by swinging its tail fins back and forth. A fish uses (3) … other fins to steer (4) … to stop. Sometimes the other fins also help it go fast through the water.
 Most fishes have bodies shaped like a torpedo. Their bodies are pointed at the head and at the tail. This streamlined body helps fish speed through water. Sailfish can swim as (5) … as 70 miles per hour (110 kilometers per hour).
(6) … fish have unusual shapes. Rays have flat, disc-shaped bodies. Large fins like wings go out from a ray’s head. To swim, rays flap the fins.
 Most fish also have swim bladders. They fill their swim bladders (7) … air. Their air-filled swim bladders act like life jackets. They keep the fish from sinking to the bottom.

Perintah : Lengkapi kalimat Rumpang menjadi kalimat efektif.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Most fish use their side, back, and tail fins for swimming. Fins (1) are movable, fanlike parts. A fish (2)swims through the water by swinging its tail fins back and forth. A fish uses (3) its other fins to steer (4) its body to stop. Sometimes the other fins also help it go fast through the water.

Most fishes have bodies shaped like a torpedo. Their bodies are pointed at the head and at the tail. This streamlined body helps fish speed through water. Sailfish can swim as (5)fast as 70 miles per hour (110 kilometers per hour).

(6)many fish have unusual shapes. Rays have flat, disc-shaped bodies. Large fins like wings go out from a ray’s head. To swim, rays flap the fins.

Most fish also have swim bladders. They fill their swim bladders (7) contain air. Their air-filled swim bladders act like life jackets. They keep the fish from sinking to the bottom.

  • Lebih simpelnya jawabannya!!!
  • 1.are
  • 2.swims
  • 3.its
  • 4.its body
  • 5.fast
  • 6.many
  • 7.contain

*

related_questions.question:
Read the paragraph below.    Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep
b. it's too painful for him too 
sleep
c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep
d. the paint is painful too to sleep
e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Read the paragraph below.

Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep

b. it's too painful for him too

sleep

c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep

d. the paint is painful too to sleep

Rudi dan teman-teman sekelasnya bermain basket pagi-pagi sekali di sekolah. Banyak siswa yang memperhatikan mereka. Pertandingan berlangsung seru sebelum kecelakaan terjadi. Sayangnya, Rudi
